title: What are some good websites to learn about buying websites? - Quora

response.answer_text: I give you a suggestion that start learning:-  1. HTML, CSS 2. JavaScript 3. PHP  Then create your own websites and sell them to get money. Because it is not a good idea to buy web sites and after a year again try to sell them. Every day new things are coming in Computer field and than you web sites will become un updated now one wish to buy them.

You sound like you want to mitigate your risk and two ways to do that is working with a broker and also being clued up! I would suggest that you take a look through this free guide: Guide to Buying an Internet Business - FE International Let me know if you have any questions.
